title: PUBG Mobile
description: PUBG Mobile: A fast-paced battle royale game where 100 players fight to be the last one standing on a shrinking map. Parachute onto an island, scavenge for weapons and gear, and engage in intense combat. Features multiple maps, modes, and seasonal updates.

title: Free Fire
description: Garena Free Fire: A fast-paced battle royale game where 50 players fight to survive on a remote island. Choose your starting point, scavenge for weapons, and outlast your opponents in intense 10-minute matches.

title: Call of Duty Mobile
description: Experience console-quality HD gaming on your mobile device with Call of Duty: Mobile. Engage in fast-paced 5v5 team deathmatches, battle royale survival modes, and thrilling Zombies action. Customize your loadouts, compete in ranked matches, and join the global community of players in this free-to-play first-person shooter.
